mapper.insert: insert into question(question_title, question_content, answers_num, followers_num, last_updated, scan_num, reply_num, is_anonymous, member_id) values(#{question_title}, #{question_content}, #{answers_num}, #{followers_num}, #{last_updated}, #{scan_num}, #{reply_num}, #{is_anonymous}, #{member_id})
mapper.select: select * from question where question_title = #{question_title} and member_id = #{member_id}
